name: NBA Fastbreak '98
overview: Select your favorite pro basketball team and compete in an exhibition game, practice session, or complete season with NBA Fastbreak '98. The game includes 29 NBA teams with an option to view the on-court action from 11 different camera angles. Lead your motion-captured athletes on a scoring spree with 27 offensive sets. Create a custom player with individual ratings in such categories as agility and shot accuracy before adding him to the free agent list. Watch buzzer-beaters and clutch plays from different perspectives with the built-in instant replay feature. Up to eight players can compete simultaneously with a choice of simulation or arcade-style settings. Features: Up to eight players can compete at one time Choose from 27 offensive sets Play a full NBA season including playoffs and the All-Star Game
